pillarDesc: This pillar focuses on the daily nutrition that support your health and wellbeing
toDo: Chose a lower sugar alternative
Eat vegetables spanning the rainbow colours
Eat within a 12 hour window (to encourage micro-fasting)
Drink at least 250ml glasses of water
Avoid processed foods (those containing more than 5 ingredients and excessive preservatives)
imageAlt: An image of a glass of water and an apple representing the Eat pillar

pillarDesc: This pillar focuses on the daily physical activities and movements that support your health and wellbeing
toDo: Walk at least 10,000 steps
Do 1 of 2 strength trainings this week
Do 1 of 2 10 minute HIIT this week
Do a movement snack
Do 1 glute movement
imageAlt: An icon of a heart beating to represent the Move pillar

pillarDesc: This pillar focuses on the daily relaxation and mindfulness activities that support your health and wellbeing
toDo: Take at least 15 minutes of 'me' time
Have a screen-free day
Write down 3 gratitudes
Be still for 5 minutes
Eat a meal distraction- and device-free
imageAlt: An icon of a music player and headphones representing relaxation and the Relax pillar

pillarDesc: This pillar focuses on the daily sleep and rest activities that support your health and wellbeing
toDo: Keep bedroom dark and put devices away/off
Spend 20 minutes outside in the morning
No technology 90 minutes before bed
Minimise any highly emotional issues/conversations before bed
Consume caffeine before lunchtime
imageAlt: An icon of a bed representing the Sleep pillar
